channel.title: Redo of the mace. [.blend and .obj release]
channel.description: Well jagex's maces are piece's of crap and they just piss me off. so i decided to take 5 mins to redo them. im on a mac so i cant make a .mqo file of it but if you want to you can import the .OBJ . i only made iron you can recolor if you want the rest. [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m461/alcazars0bby/Picture1-1.png[/img] render: [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m461/alcazars0bby/redoofmace.jpg[/img] DOWNLOADS: .blend "for blender" http://uppit.com/121ov6i2e686/mace_redo.blend .OBJ "to import into metaseq" http://uppit.com/r6hgag75dti3/mace_redo.obj

item.title: Redo of the mace. [.blend and .obj release]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

That is more of a quadruple faced battleaxe… a mace is more of dense mass (ball) of something, sometimes with spikes or large protrusions, on the end of a stick.

Read full topic

item.title: Redo of the mace. [.blend and .obj release]
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

Well jagex’s maces are piece’s of crap and they just piss me off. so i decided to take 5 mins to redo them. im on a mac so i cant make a .mqo file of it but if you want to you can import the .OBJ . i only made iron you can recolor if you want the rest.
